summary: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.
cast: Jack Nicholson|Harvey Keitel|Meg Tilly|Madeleine Stowe|Eli Wallach|Rubén Blades|Frederic Forrest|David Keith|Richard Farnsworth|Tracey Walter|Joe Mantell|James Hong|Perry Lopez|Jeff Morris|Rebecca Broussard|Paul A. title: Los dos Jakes
